```{r main calculations}
# import libraries
library(curl)           # needed for fread to call in github data files
library(shiny)          # shiny framework
library(ggplot2)        # line chart viz
library(data.table)     # data munging
library(flexdashboard)  # dashboard framework
library(imputeTS)       # TS imputation

# read data from github ##########################################################################
d <- rbind(fread("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/johnsug/wt/master/recent_wt.csv"), 
           fread("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/johnsug/wt/master/archived_wt.csv"))
d$Date <- as.Date(d$Date, format="%m/%d/%Y")
## impute missing values
frame <- data.table(Date=as.Date(d$Date[dim(d)[1]]:d$Date[1], origin="1970-01-01"))
d <- data.table(dplyr::left_join(frame, d))
d[, Int:=round(na_interpolation(d$Weight, option="linear"),1)]
d[, Rolling:=frollmean(Int, n=7, fill=NA)]
d$Year <- as.numeric(substr(d$Date,1,4))
recent <- head(d, 1)
comps  <- d[Weight %between% c(recent$Weight - 2.5, recent$Weight + 2.5) & Date < recent$Date - 60]
comps  <- comps[order(Date)]

# plots ##########################################################################################

# Since Keto
##lm, glm, gam, loess, rlm
output$plot_keto <- renderPlot({
  ggplot(d[Date > "2017-10-01"], aes(x=Date, y=Rolling)) + 
    geom_hline(yintercept=recent$Weight, color="dodgerblue", size=1, alpha=.3) + 
    # marathons
    geom_vline(xintercept=as.Date("2018-04-21"), color="orange", size=1, alpha=.3) + 
    geom_vline(xintercept=as.Date("2018-10-20"), color="orange", size=1, alpha=.3) + 
    geom_vline(xintercept=as.Date("2018-12-08"), color="orange", size=1, alpha=.3) + 
    geom_vline(xintercept=as.Date("2019-07-20"), color="orange", size=1, alpha=.3) + 
    geom_vline(xintercept=as.Date("2019-10-05"), color="orange", size=1, alpha=.3) + 
    # trail events
    geom_vline(xintercept=as.Date("2019-04-27"), color="red", size=1, alpha=.3) + 
    geom_vline(xintercept=as.Date("2020-02-22"), color="red", size=1, alpha=.3) + 
    # plot and smooth weight
    geom_line(aes(x=Date, Y=Int), color="dodgerblue", size=1) + 
    geom_smooth(data=d[Date >= "2017-10-01"], color="deeppink", fill="deeppink", alpha=.15, size=.5, method="loess", span=0.15) + 
    labs(x="", y="Weight (Lbs)") + 
    theme_minimal()
})

# Since 2014
output$plot_since_14 <- renderPlot({
  ggplot(d, aes(x=Date, y=Weight)) + 
    geom_point(color="dodgerblue", size=1) + 
    geom_smooth(data=d[Date <= "2017-01-05"], color=6, fill=6, alpha=.15, size=.5, met02hod="loess", span=0.30) + 
    geom_smooth(data=d[Date %between% c("2017-01-01", "2017-10-01")], color=6, fill=6, alpha=.15, size=.5, method="loess", span=0.50) + 
    geom_smooth(data=d[Date >= "2017-10-01"], color=6, fill=6, alpha=.15, size=.5, method="loess", span=0.10) + 
    labs(x="", y="Weight (Lbs)") + 
    theme_minimal()
})

output$comps_table <- renderDataTable(comps)

```
